CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Started"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Not Started"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Data Mapping Performed"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Data Mapping Scheduled"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Design"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Design & Development"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Development"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Development Planning"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"In Development"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"On Hold"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Testing"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Testing (About to Go Live)"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation_Status__c,"Business Process Assessment") ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Sales Coupon Available (Exp. June 30)
